Package oh_hecc.game_parts.metadata

Interface MetadataEditingInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Heccable, Parseable, SharedMetadata
All Known Implementing Classes:
EditableMetadata
public interface MetadataEditingInterface extends SharedMetadata
An interface to be used for editing the metadata.

  • Method Details

    • checkTitleValidity

      static String checkTitleValidity​(String newTitleToCheck) throws InvalidMetadataDeclarationException
      Checks whether or not a new title for the game would be valid or not
      Parameters:
      newTitleToCheck - the new title which needs checking
      Returns:
      a trimmed version of the new title being checked (if valid)
      Throws:
      InvalidMetadataDeclarationException - if the new title is invalid

    • checkAuthorValidity

      static String checkAuthorValidity​(String newAuthorToCheck) throws InvalidMetadataDeclarationException
      Checks the validity of a given 'author' value
      Parameters:
      newAuthorToCheck - the 'author' string that needs to be checked
      Returns:
      a trimmed version of the newAuthorToCheck (matching the VALID_AUTHOR_REGEX)
      Throws:
      InvalidMetadataDeclarationException - if newAuthorToCheck is not a valid author name

    • updateTitle

      boolean updateTitle​(String newTitle) throws InvalidMetadataDeclarationException
      Attempts to update the title of the game
      Parameters:
      newTitle - the new title being used
      Returns:
      true if the new title was valid (and the title could be changed)
      Throws:
      InvalidMetadataDeclarationException - if newTitle is invalid

    • updateComment

      void updateComment​(String newComment)
      updates the comment
      Parameters:
      newComment - the new comment for the object

    • updateAuthor

      boolean updateAuthor​(String newAuthor) throws InvalidMetadataDeclarationException
      Attempts to update the 'author' field of this EditableMetadata object
      Parameters:
      newAuthor - the new value for the 'author' field
      Returns:
      true if the 'author' was updated successfully
      Throws:
      InvalidMetadataDeclarationException - if the given 'newAuthor' is not a valid 'author' input

    • updateStartPassage

      boolean updateStartPassage​(String newStartPassage) throws InvalidPassageNameException
      Attempts to update the 'startPassage' field of this object
      Parameters:
      newStartPassage - the name of the new intended start passage
      Returns:
      true if the start passage was updated successfully
      Throws:
      InvalidPassageNameException - if the new start passage isn't valid
